attributes.action: Introduce a licence to improve safety for Motocycle Pillion Passengers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the shocking video footage of a man convicted of travelling over 120mph on his bike with his 14 year old son on the back, is it time for legislation to protect pillion riders?

Pillion riders have a big impact on the handling of a motorcycle. If there was legislation to require pillion riders to undergo a course covering handling behavior and safety, giving them a license, this will help to cut down on accidents involving motorbikes.

A license could:

Improve handling of motorbikes with pillion passengers and improve their safety.

Have an age restriction of say, 16. 

Require all mortorcyclists to wear the correct protective clothing in addition to a crash helmet.
